====== DESCRIPTION ======

LIC Arts Open is seeking work that is reflective of the moods and feelings engendered by Summer. The Ancients described the season as one of growth, it is also frequently associated with fertility and abundance. We have 2 large spacious galleries offering around 10,000 square foot of space.

Work can be in any medium from Painting to Sculpture to Ceramics to Installations and more. The exhibition will open on June 20th and close on July 19th


===== INSTRUCTIONS =====

Please apply using this form: https://form.jotform.com

If you are a previous participant in LIC Arts Open you pay a reduced application fee of $15. Work must be ready to hang with fixings, wire and hanging systems installed. Also, all work must have the artists name on the back of the piece. Please note also that when you apply please make a note of the pieces you have submitted. Work must be dropped off and picked up at the appropriate listed times. Work must be as submitted we cannot accept substitutions. Deadline is June 10th and if successful the drop off is June 15 & 16 between 3 - 6 pm.
